subject: Computer and Video Games
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Handicapping the World Cup can be a tricky business, but the official video game of the tournament, EA Sports’ 2014 FIFA World Cup Brazil, did.
snippet: Handicapping the World Cup can be a tricky business, but the official video game of the tournament, EA Sports’ 2014 FIFA World Cup Brazil, did.
